Projects.description: A live Crypto Currency tracker built with React. I am extremely interested in blockchain technology and Crypto currencies, so I  created my own live tracker with an attractive visual user interface

A generated random User API displayinng each individuals information. Complete with a search bar and pagination buttons. I created this project to build my skills with fetching API's using vanilla JavaScript.
A Cafe website using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I used my skills in CSS grid and flexbox to create a great looking website that can be applied to many projects.

A guessing phrase game. I used object-oriented programming (OOP) to create a guessing game. The user can win or loose depending whether they guess the correct phrase and will be shown a winner or loser screen. Give the game a go and see if you can guess the phrases! Have fun!

A full-stack confrence mockup website with an interactive register form. I used Bootstrap, CSS and JavaScript to create a two page website. A page displaying a full-stack conference, and if the user decides to registere they  will be sent to a second page. A interactive form using Regular Expresions which will allow to user to complete the form if all inputs are completed correctly
A react webpage which generates trending gifs from an API. Complete with a search bar to see your favourite gifs!
A react webpage which generates images from Flikr API. Complete with a search bar to see your favourite pictures!
